main event: A star-sized object was observed on radar traveling at high speed, making a sharp right turn and disappearing beyond the horizon.
interesting points: The sighting was recorded in August 1957 by observers at Robins Air Force Base., The object was noted to have erratic movement back and forth., The report indicated a conflict in positional data., The object traveled southeast and was observed for about 5 minutes., There was a mention of visible planets, which may have caused confusion in identifying the object.
witness description: Ground observer, witnessed from Robins Housing, Georgia.
